pageContext.claim: “It's Kamala, the most liberal person in the U.S senate. You know, I tell it all the time, she started off her poll numbers at 15, 14, 12, 12. Then she went back up to 12 and a half.”
pageContext.analysis: GovTrack ranked Harris as the “most liberal” senator in 2019 based on the number of bills she co-sponsored with Republicans, a narrow metric — not a ranking of her ideology on the issues.
